name: Morita Shougi for WonderSwan
overview: Morita Shogi, which has a history of more than 10 years and has become a staple of computer shogi software, has appeared in WonderSwan. A thought program with stable strength and sharpness is sure to satisfy users! The game has three levels of difficulty, and hand can be selected from eight types of hand such as dropping a car or dropping six. In addition, there is also a “Wait!” function. If you have this, you can enjoy high-quality shogi anytime, anywhere, so this is definitely a must-see for shogi fans.
